questions.question: The interview was as easy as ........................... and I am confident of getting the job.
questions.description: If something is as easy as pie, it is very easy.

questions.question: She seems to have a ................................. in every pie.
questions.description: To have a finger in every pie is to be involved in so many things.

questions.question: I thought the exam would be hard but it was a piece of ................................
questions.description: If something is a piece of cake, it is very easy to do.

questions.question: Her dream of becoming a famous model remained a ................................ in the sky.
questions.description: A pie in the sky is an unrealistic dream.

questions.question: It was a half-............................ plan, so I was not surprised when it failed.
questions.description: A half baked plan is something that is not thought through.

questions.question: My landlady is as ................................. as a fruitcake. I can't get on with her anymore.
questions.description: As nutty as a fruitcake means very crazy.

questions.question: They were selling clothes for ................................ at the garage sale.
Although his project failed he was too proud to eat ...............................
questions.description: To eat crow is to admit that you made a mistake.

questions.question: If you are a rich kid you may be used to getting everything handed to you on a ............................... platter.
It is crucial to work hard. Keep in mind that there is no such thing as a free ..............................
She would never have participated in that beauty contest if her parents hadn't ................................... her on.
questions.description: To egg someone on is to encourage them.

questions.question: I need a job to bring home the ………………………..
questions.description: To bring home the bacon is to earn money to live.
